verses.verse: "Coastlands,<WH339> listen to Me in silence,<WH2790> And let the peoples<WH3816> gain<WH2498> new<WH2498> strength;<WH3581> Let them come<WH5066> forward,<WH5066> then<WH227> let them speak;<WH1696> Let us come<WH7126> together<WH9191> for judgment.<WH4941>

"Who<WH4310> has aroused<WH5782> one from the east<WH4217> Whom He calls<WH7121> in righteousness<WH6664> to His feet<WH7272>? He delivers<WH5414> up nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> him, And subdues<WH7287> kings.<WH4428> He makes<WH5414> them like dust<WH6083> with his sword,<WH2719> As the wind-driven chaff<WH7179> with his bow.<WH7198>
"He pursues<WH7291> them, passing<WH5674> on in safety,<WH7965> By a way<WH734> he had not been traversing<WH935> with his feet.<WH7272>

"Who<WH4310> has performed<WH6466> and accomplished<WH6213> [it,] Calling<WH7121> forth the generations<WH1755> from the beginning<WH7218>? 'I, the Lord,<WH3068> am the first,<WH7223> and with the last.<WH314> I am He.'"
The coastlands<WH339> have seen<WH7200> and are afraid;<WH3372> The ends<WH7098> of the earth<WH776> tremble;<WH2729> They have drawn<WH7126> near<WH7126> and have come.<WH857>
Each<WH376> one<WH376> helps<WH5826> his neighbor,<WH7453> And says<WH559> to his brother,<WH251> "Be strong!<WH2388>"

So the craftsman<WH2796> encourages<WH2388> the smelter,<WH6884> [And] he who smooths<WH9140> [metal] with the hammer<WH6360> [encourages] him who beats<WH1986> the anvil,<WH6471> Saying<WH559> of the soldering,<WH1694> "It is good<WH2896>"; And he fastens<WH2388> it with nails,<WH4548> [That] it should not totter.<WH4131>
"But you, Israel,<WH3478> My servant,<WH5650> Jacob<WH3290> whom<WH834> I have chosen,<WH977> Descendant<WH2233> of Abraham<WH85> My friend,<WH157>

You whom<WH834> I have taken<WH2388> from the ends<WH7098> of the earth,<WH776> And called<WH7121> from its remotest<WH678> parts,<WH678> And said<WH559> to you, 'You are My servant,<WH5650> I have chosen<WH977> you and not rejected<WH3988> you.

'Do not fear,<WH3372> for I am with you; Do not anxiously look<WH8159> about you, for I am your God.<WH430> I will strengthen<WH553> you, surely<WH637> I will help<WH5826> you, Surely<WH637> I will uphold<WH8551> you with My righteous<WH6664> right<WH3225> hand.<WH3225>'

"Behold,<WH2005> all<WH3605> those who are angered<WH2734> at you will be shamed<WH954> and dishonored;<WH3637> Those<WH376> who<WH376> contend<WH7379> with you will be as nothing,<WH369> and will perish.
"You will seek<WH1245> those<WH376> who<WH376> quarrel<WH4695> with you, but will not find<WH4672> them, Those<WH376> who<WH376> war<WH4421> with you will be as nothing,<WH369> and non-existent.
"For I am the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who upholds<WH2388> your right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> Who says<WH559> to you, 'Do not fear,<WH3372> I will help<WH5826> you.'

"Do not fear,<WH3372> you worm<WH9641> Jacob,<WH3290> you men<WH4962> of Israel;<WH3478> I will help<WH5826> you," declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "and your Redeemer<WH1350> is the Holy<WH6918> One<WH6918> of Israel.<WH3478>

"Behold,<WH2009> I have made<WH7760> you a new,<WH2319> sharp<WH9167> threshing<WH4173> sledge<WH4173> with double edges;<WH6310> You will thresh<WH1758> the mountains,<WH2022> and pulverize<WH1854> [them,] And will make<WH7760> the hills<WH1389> like chaff.<WH4671>

"You will winnow<WH2219> them, and the wind<WH7307> will carry<WH5375> them away, And the storm<WH9370> will scatter<WH6327> them; But you will rejoice<WH1523> in the Lord,<WH3068> You will glory<WH1984> in the Holy<WH6918> One<WH6918> of Israel.<WH3478>

"The afflicted<WH6041> and needy<WH34> are seeking<WH1245> water,<WH4325> but there<WH369> is none,<WH369> And their tongue<WH3956> is parched<WH5405> with thirst;<WH6772> I, the Lord,<WH3068> will answer<WH6030> them Myself, [As] the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> I will not forsake<WH5800> them.

"I will open<WH6605> rivers<WH5104> on the bare<WH8205> heights,<WH8205> And springs<WH4599> in the midst<WH8432> of the valleys;<WH1237> I will make<WH7760> the wilderness<WH4057> a pool<WH98> of water,<WH4325> And the dry<WH6723> land<WH776> fountains<WH4161> of water.<WH4325>

"I will put<WH5414> the cedar<WH730> in the wilderness,<WH4057> The acacia,<WH7848> and the myrtle,<WH1918> and the olive<WH8081> tree;<WH8410> I will place<WH7760> the juniper<WH1265> in the desert,<WH6160> Together<WH9191> with the box<WH8410> tree<WH8391> and the cypress,<WH8391>

That they may see<WH7200> and recognize,<WH3045> And consider<WH7760> and gain<WH7919> insight<WH7919> as well,<WH9191> That the hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH3068> has done<WH6213> this,<WH384> And the Holy<WH6918> One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478> has created<WH1254> it.
"Present<WH7126> your case,<WH7379>" the Lord<WH3068> says.<WH559> "Bring<WH5066> forward<WH5066> your strong<WH6110> [arguments,]" The King<WH4428> of Jacob<WH3290> says.<WH559>

Let them bring<WH5066> forth<WH5066> and declare<WH5046> to us what<WH834> is going to take<WH7136> place;<WH7136> As for the former<WH7223> [events,] declare<WH5046> what<WH4100> they [were,] That we may consider<WH7760> them, and know<WH3045> their outcome;<WH319> Or<WH176> announce<WH8085> to us what is coming.<WH935>

Declare<WH5046> the things<WH857> that are going to come<WH857> afterward,<WH268> That we may know<WH3045> that you are gods;<WH430> Indeed,<WH637> do<WH3190> good<WH3190> or evil,<WH7489> that we may anxiously look<WH8159> about us and fear<WH3372> together.<WH9191>
Behold,<WH2005> you are of no<WH369> account,<WH369> And your work<WH6467> amounts to nothing;<WH657> He who chooses<WH977> you is an abomination.<WH8441>

"I have aroused<WH5782> one from the north,<WH6828> and he has come;<WH857> From the rising<WH4217> of the sun<WH8121> he will call<WH7121> on My name;<WH8034> And he will come<WH935> upon rulers<WH5461> as [upon] mortar,<WH2563> Even as the potter<WH3335> treads<WH7429> clay.<WH2563>"

Who<WH4310> has declared<WH5046> [this] from the beginning,<WH7218> that we might know<WH3045>? Or from former<WH6440> times,<WH6440> that we may say,<WH559> "[He is] right!<WH6662>"? Surely<WH637> there<WH369> was no<WH369> one<WH369> who declared,<WH5046> Surely<WH637> there<WH369> was no<WH369> one<WH369> who proclaimed,<WH8085> Surely<WH637> there<WH369> was no<WH369> one<WH369> who heard<WH8085> your words.<WH561>
"Formerly<WH7223> [I said] to Zion,<WH6726> 'Behold,<WH2009> here<WH2009> they are.' And to Jerusalem,<WH3389> 'I will give<WH5414> a messenger<WH1319> of good news.<WH1319>'
"But when I look,<WH7200> there<WH369> is no<WH369> one,<WH376> And there<WH369> is no<WH369> counselor<WH3289> among<WH4480> them Who, if I ask,<WH7592> can give<WH7725> an answer.<WH1697>
"Behold,<WH2005> all<WH3605> of them are false;<WH205> Their works<WH4639> are worthless,<WH657> Their molten<WH9333> images<WH9333> are wind<WH7307> and emptiness.<WH8414>
